About the Company: BDH Industries Ltd is engaged in the manufacture and marketing of formulations and bulk drugs. The company is today recognised as one of India`s leading manufacturers of therapeutic formulations covering wide range of pharmaceuticals. They also export a wide range of finished pharmaceutical formulations and bulk drugs to leading organizations in several countries, including Australia, Bolivia, Denmark, Dominican Republic, Germany,etc.The products offered by the Company falls under the following therapeutical categories namely Anti-cancer ,Antibiotics & Anti-microbials,Cardiovascular ,Psychotropic ,External Preparations , Sterile Opthalmics Preparations , Generics & Branded Generics and Injectables. They also manufacture sildenafil citrate tablets for male impotency
